alert.note: Alert for Ascension; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 01 at 4:33AM CST until December 01 at 7:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South Central East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East Central Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 433 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 2 inches in 2 hours. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, Livingston, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Old Jefferson, Shenandoah, Village St. George, Inniswold, Westminster, Prairieville, Gardere and Merrydale. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 151 and 174. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 3. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-2 INCHES IN 2 HOURS
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Livingston; West Baton Rouge
